defines.label: day
defines.documentation: Returns a number of the day

defines.label: daysInMonth
defines.documentation: Returns a count of days in the month

defines.label: daysInYear
defines.documentation: Returns a count of days in the year

defines.label: hour
defines.documentation: Returns an hour of the time

defines.label: isLeapYear
defines.documentation: Returns true if the year is leap.

defines.label: minute
defines.documentation: Returns a minute of the time

defines.label: month
defines.documentation: Returns a month of the date.

defines.label: second
defines.documentation: Returns a second of the time.

defines.label: weekDay
defines.documentation: Return a number of the day in the week.

defines.label: year
defines.documentation: Returns the year of the date.

defines.label: yearDay
defines.documentation: Return a number of the day in the year.
